mapper.select: select p.id,p.price,p.name, p.lineation_price,pi.image_url from t_product p left join t_product_image pi on p.id=pi.product_id where p.id=#{productId} and pi.status='1' and pi.type ='1'

select p.id,p.price,p.name, p.lineation_price,pi.image_url,p.summary from t_product p left join t_product_image pi on p.id=pi.product_id where pi.status='1' and pi.type ='1' and p.category_id=#{categoryId}
